ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: SUMMER PROGRAMS, SUPERVISED ACTIVITIES ASSOCIATED WITH SUMMER CAMP - SWIMMING, CRAFTS, FIELD TRIPS, ETC

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSES 73,123. COST OF GOODS SOLD 40,941.
FINANCIAL AID AND DISCOUNTS NETTED AGAINST TUITION REVENUE 752,310.
SPECIAL EVENT EXPENSES 73,123. COST OF GOODS SOLD 40,941.
FINANCIAL AID AND DISCOUNTS NETTED AGAINST TUITION REVENUE 752,310.
THE SCHOOL HAS PUBLICIZED ITS RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY IN NEWSPAPERS, MAGAZINES AND BROCHURES.

CONGRESSIONAL SCHOOL OFFERS FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE FOR CHILDREN ENROLLED IN PRESCHOOL THROUGH 8TH GRADE FOR FAMILIES THAT QUALIFY FOR ASSISTANCE BEYOND THE GRANT GIVEN TO EACH CHILD WHO ATTENDS THE SCHOOL. (TUITION ALONE DOES NOT COVER THE FULL COST OF EDUCATING EACH CHILD.) CONGRESSIONAL UTILIZES A PROGRAM ADMINISTERED BY SCHOOL & STUDENT SERVICES (SSS) IN PRINCETON, NJ TO ASSIST IN EVALUATING THE APPROPRIATE LEVEL OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE THAT MAY BE AWARDED. THE CONGRESSIONAL SCHOOL ALSO OFFERS DISCOUNTS TO CHILDREN OF EMPLOYEES.
PART I, LINE 1A - JANET MARSH, HEAD OF SCHOOL, RECEIVED HOUSING ALLOWANCE IN THE AMOUNT OF $44,543.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WILLIAM DEVERS, GRETCHEN DEVERS AND LINDSEY DEVERS-BASILEO - FAMILY RELATIONSHIP

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REVIEWS THE FORM 990 THROUGH CAREFUL EXAMINATION BY THE SCHOOLS DIRECTOR OF FINANCE AND OPERATIONS AND HEAD OF SCHOOL. A DRAFT FORM IS ALSO MADE AVAILABLE TO THE SCHOOL'S BOARD AND TREASURER FOR COMMENTS. CORRECTIONS AND CHANGES ARE MADE AND THIS GROUP THEN APPROVED A FINAL COPY TO BE FILED WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL TRUSTEES AND THE HEAD OF SCHOOL SIGN THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY EACH YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES REVIEWS AND APPROVES THE HEAD OF SCHOOL'S ANNUAL COMPENSATION. THE BOARD REVIEWS SALARY SURVEYS AND GUIDELINES PROVIDED BY INDEPENDENT ORGANIZATIONS SUCH AS IE (INDEPENDENT EDUCATION), NAIS (NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS), AND ISM (INDEPENDENT SCHOOL MANAGEMENT). SALARY INFORMATION AND PERFORMANCE MEASURES ARE ALL CONSIDERED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE, WHICH WOULD RECOMMEND TO THE BOARD, COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
